pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with United Nations Secretary General Antonio Guterres | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met with UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres.

The Prime Minister and the Secretary General reconfirmed the importance of multilateral institutions for promoting open, inclusive, peaceful societies.

The Prime Minister welcomed the UN Secretary Generalâ€™s Climate Action Summit 2019 in September, and the two leaders agreed on the importance of working closely together to maintain momentum on combatting climate change.
